name: Pineapple Pork Chops

ingredients.name: pineapple, peeled, cored, and sliced into rings
ingredients.additionalInstruction: or 1—19 oz (540 ml) can pineapple rings, drained

preparation: Place pork chops in a shallow bowl. Drizzle with 1⁄4 cup Vinaigrette. Turn chops to coat evenly. Cover and refrigerate to marinate, at least 30 minutes, or up to 3 days.
When ready to grill, preheat barbecue to medium-high.
Place chops on grill. Grill, turning often, until cooked through, 6–10 minutes, depending on thickness of chops.
Add pineapple to grill towards end of cooking. Lightly char both sides, about 30 seconds per side.
Place chops on plates and top with pineapple. Drizzle remaining Vinaigrette overtop.

products.name: Balsamic Vinaigrette Dressing Mix
summary: Fresh, bright & bold blend of Mediterranean herbs with notes of garlic & rosemary. Our most versatile dressing.
